name: Heavyweight Wrestling Fighting Cup
description:
Master your super fighting skills! Unleash your inner fury and start your career of the best fighter ever! Defeat all your opponents! Become a top fighter and have fun with Heavyweight Wrestling Fighting Cup!

Welcome to the greatest wrestling fighting tournament ever! Beat these fantastically skillful human fighters and become the absolute champion of these interesting rings! They all look like mighty and massive dexterous people, and they want to kick your spirit out of your body! They use different creative fighting style, they are slim and angry! Explore various kinds of rings, give a dare to one of these brutal human beings and become a real champion!

Do your best and hold your ground as long as possible! Find out the information about these cruel fighters’ skills and knock them down! Your mission is clear – just lay them all down and you’ll find yourself at the top of the tournament list! Would you choose BigMan, Hawk, Queen, Brad, Mr. Time or anybody else? This choice is up to you! Every blow brings you near the shattering victory! Join the team of fantastic fighters with Heavyweight Wrestling Fighting Cup!

Earn points and upgrade your speed, power and accuracy or unlock new blows and fighting styles! Check four game modes – VS mode, where you should fight your enemies face to face; survival mode, where you should stay alive at the ring as long as you can; stair mode, where you should become the first in the tournament list; and training mode, where you may train all your blows and super strikes!


Heavyweight Wrestling Fighting Cup features:
• Ultimate wrestle fighting game
• Interesting fighting styles and super blows
• Check four game modes
• Simple and intuitive controls

Challenge various interesting fighters and have the most unusual battle ever with Heavyweight Wrestling Fighting Cup!
